Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory195.png'}
{3: 'Hello there, friend.'}
{3: 'Ah, forget it, "friend." What nonsense it is. By now, you should have already realized that this is just a madman\'s ravings with an imaginary friend.'}
{3: 'Have you ever wondered what it would be like, on the day you die?'}
{3: 'I might die at any time. I\'m close enough to "that place," so there\'s no need for me to hide anymore.'}
{3: "Strangely, I don't have any resentment about it."}
{3: 'When those people were after me, I ran like a rat prodded by some hot metal rod.'}
{3: 'When Roland burned the research facility to the ground, I was cowering like a child.'}
{3: 'When I learned that it was the Godfather who betrayed me, though, I instead felt nothing.'}
{3: "Maybe it's true what their leader, the little girl, said... that humans are weak, vile, unworthy of trust. That must be the case."}
{3: '—I finally feel like things are about to come to an end.'}
{3: "But I must apologize, my friend, this story of mine... It's not some thrilling tale."}
{3: 'Only now, do I realize that I am nothing but a coward. A coward that, even to kill a man, I need someone to place the knife in my hand.'}
{3: 'Hello, friend. I guess this is goodbye.'}
{3: "I've never made proper farewells before. So allow me, my imaginary friend, allow me a proper farewell."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, in the main plaza on the other side of the hidden passage...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: '...So, how was your last supper?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Ah, I must have forgotten. You're no longer human. You don't require food.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Have you bid your farewells to family and friends?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Ah, I jest. You have no family or friends.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "He who has nothing, did you at least have a good, last night's sleep?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna shakes her head in face of Shome's silence."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Pitiful child.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Even the last day of your life is in such misery.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: "You're not after what I know, are you? You went to all this trouble looking for me, not because you're trying to know something."}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'You knew from the beginning. You only wanted my death.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Yes, I don't care at all. Not a sliver.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Luna', 3: "Perhaps it's because of your impudence. That merciful agent protected you by making you an Ascendant, but instead, you squandered your hard-earned rebirth, marching into territories not yours to tread.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I hope your death will make others agents realize, that humans are not worth saving.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss, the info backup he scattered in various parts of the theme park have been found and destroyed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'The execution can begin at anytime.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'Just that?'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: "That's what you people want? To take the Ascension-Network, all for your own?"}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'How dare you, mere mortal! Guessing at the will of Miss Luna!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Thank you, Gabriel.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Looking at the time, ours guests should be arriving soon...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Indeed. They are close.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'So, any last words?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: '...Just what are you waiting for?'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Ah, what am I waiting for, indeed?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Don't worry, it's not what you are waiting for, that's for certain.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'An X-shaped shadow squirms quickly near Luna. Space distorts, and a figure materializes out of thin air.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Miss Luna... I'm here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Did you do everything I told you to?', 4: '1'}
{3: "In appreciation, or perhaps out of mere amusement, Luna stretches out a hand and gently pats Lamia's face."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'M-M-Miss Luna...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Good work. You did well. Step back and wait for everything to end.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{3: 'You step into the plaza, only to see...'}
{3: '...The remains of a certain Construct, scattered all over the plaza. A massive figure, with his back facing you, is admiring a huge bionic statue in front.'}
{3: 'As if sensing your arrival, the figure turns toward you—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "I've been waiting for you.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{3: 'Shortly before the Gray Raven arrived...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'As you wish.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Our guests from Babylonia seem to be late.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Is this part of your plan too, Miss?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "This is our own problem. We'll deal with it ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, the massive cartoonish statue behind them suddenly begins to transform.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'You ran here last for this statue... Ah, no this is a mere holo-projection. You are here for the real Shark-speare underneath it.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Shark-speare, the defense robot made in the image of an animation from your childhood.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: '...How did you know?'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Did you not say so yourself? I know what you know. I want what you want. No?'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I hope this makes you feel better on your way to hell.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A shadow flies out of the holo-projection and prances slowly to Shome.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryYaoHe.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "The shadow crunches on Shome's torso, as if trying to break him into two."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'ARRRGGH!!!'}
{3: 'Almost instantly, the shadow pulls Shome back into the holo-projection and returns.'}
{3: 'A rumble of mechanical screeches ring out from within. Crushing, fracturing, masticating—at something.'}
{3: "No screams. No cries. Only chewing. Fluids and gears fall near the statue's feet."}
